name: places/ChIJKdQfkvpYwokR740rDwGSnzY
formattedAddress: 20 W 55th St 5th Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 20 W 55th St 5th Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
Having walked into many  New York Art Galleries, I can sincerely say that Rehs Gallery on 20 west 55th street 5th floor is by far my favorite of them all. If you appreciate collecting fine art as much as I do, I highly recommend visiting Rehs.

They have recently moved, renovated and expanded their gallery. Brightly lit and spacious, the art is showcased in a very classy manner. This gallery is absolutely stunning !
The art is exquisite and varied from classic to contemporary .

Rehs, a family run business, has been dealing with art for over 90 years and it's clearly evident. They are very professional, welcoming ,kind, friendly  and personable.

Wishing you much continued success as you deserve no less.

Do yourselves a favor and visit Rehs !

originalText.text: Other than me does anyone else know that you are probably the best living scholar on Cortes in the world ( not to diminish your knowledge of other fields) ? BTW, the recent listing of the Blanchard Pantheon seems Cortes-like in style. It is really wonderful.

originalText.text: We have bought several pieces from Rehs Gallery.  From our experience, knowledgeable, reliable, honest and professional are just some of the characteristics that describe Rehs Gallery.  They are willing to share their extensive knowledge of artists, the art world, and the art business which makes for an informed buying decision.  They do what they say and carefully vet each piece to assure authenticity and quality.  Finally, everything about their operation is professional, from the no pressure discussion of the pieces to the way the purchased piece is packaged and shipped.

originalText.text:
I have long been an admirer of Todd M Casey beautiful paintings. Living in Australia, I wasn’t able to see them in person, but being able to view the images in hi res on the website was very helpful.
Everything went so smoothly, from paying the bill to receiving shipping updates, and within a week, Rehs had delivered to me from New York to Australia, two wonderful paintings of Todd Casey’s. They were packaged with such care, bubble wrapped, mdf board and cardboard box to protect them in the long journey. Each painting took my breath away.
I would happily buy again from Rehs, and look forward to expanding my collection in the future.
Thank you for most wonderful service.

originalText.text: Although they were packing everything to  transition to a larger space at the time of my visit, Howard was gracious, and let us linger around. He offered us an opportunity to see a Stuart Dunkle up close. The quality of the paintings I was able to view was of exceptional quality! I'm looking forward to visiting again in the new, much larger gallery!
